description: The&nbsp;mint julep is a spirit-based beverage typically served over ice. But this version gives it an extra touch of Mexican flavor in honor of&nbsp;Cinco de Mayo - complete with&nbsp;mezcal, jalapenos, and brown sugar!
name: Mexican Mint Julep
recipeIngredient: Bunch of mint leaves for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Add brown sugar and water to a rocks glass or julep cup.
